      • getAllSalesOrders

        java.util.ArrayList<SalesOrder> getAllSalesOrders(boolean retrieveAssociation)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Get all SalesOrders in the Database
        Parameters:
        retrieveAssociation - set to true if all SalesOrders are to be returned
        Returns:
        ArrayList of all SalesOrder objects in Database
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                           boolean retrieveAssociation)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Get a specific SalesOrder by SalesOrder Id
        Parameters:
        id - the Id of the SalesOrder to be returned
        retrieveAssociation - set to true if SalesOrder with id is to be returned
        Returns:
        SalesOrder object with ID

        java.lang.Exception

      • getAllSalesOrdersByCustomer

        java.util.ArrayList<SalesOrder> getAllSalesOrdersByCustomer(java.lang.String customerName,
                                                          boolean retrieveAssociation)
                                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Get all SalesOrders for a specific customer by customerName
        Parameters:
        customerName - the name of a customer for whom all SalesOrders are to be returned
        retrieveAssociation - set to true if you want SalesOrders for customer to be returned
        Returns:
        ArrayList of SalesOrders for a customer with customerName
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getAllSalesOrdersByCustomer

        java.util.ArrayList<SalesOrder> getAllSalesOrdersByCustomer(long customerId,
                                                          boolean retrieveAssociation)
                                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Get all SalesOrders for a specific customer by customerId
        Parameters:
        customerId - the ID/PhoneNo of a customer for whom all SalesOrders are to be returned
        retrieveAssociation - set to true if you want SalesOrders for customer to be returned
        Returns:
        ArrayList of SalesOrders for a customer with customerName
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
